title: Flower patch/Seeds
content:
Flower seeds[edit | edit source]

Level Seed Growth time[n 1] Experience Uses
Plant Harvest Total[n 2]
2
Marigold 		4×5 mins 8.5 47 55.5
  • Protecting potato, onion, tomato plants
  • Payment to protect hammerstone hops. (1)
11
Rosemary 		4×5 mins 12 66.5 78.5
  • Making Impling jars
  • Protecting cabbage plants
24
Nasturtium 		4×5 mins 19.5 111 130.5
  • Making Imp repellent
  • Protecting watermelon plants
  • Payment to protect wildblood hops. (1)
25
Woad seed 		4×5 mins 20.5 115.5 136
  • Making various dyes
26
Limpwurt 		4×5 mins 21.5 120 141.5
  • (Super) Strength potion ingredient
58
White lily 		4×5 mins 42 250 292
  • Protects all neighboring allotments from disease
  1. ^ N×5 mins means the crop will grow a little and can be watered again for each 5 minutes. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
  2. ^ Most flowers yield 1 flower when picked, but woad leaves will yield 3 leaves and limpwurt roots will yield a minimum of 3 and up to 13 roots, depending on farming level.
